captions.text: Is there anything better than to be driving in the third or fourth gear going at 110 or 120kmh completely aware that only I am in control of the car, not the opposite.
The rules of the Red Bull Car Park Drift are, 10%of the score comes from crowd reaction, 10% on the looks of the car,10% on the sound and the amount of smoke, 40% on the drifting skills.
There's also a new rule this year, which is the clipping point, front and back.
The front of the car should be as close as possible to the clipping point, so should the back.
If the car hits the clipping point only from the back, the driver gets up to 10 points.
Who are the two that will come with us to Dubai to participate in the regional final?
Abdo Feghali will now perform a drifting demonstration
The victory rush I'm feeling now is something I've worked hard for.
Last year was on a whole other level for me especially compared to the international drivers.
To win in Dubai I have to prepare and improve as well as get to know the car even better to achieve what I want . Hopefully I can win in Dubai.
